or " Osian "  popularily known as " Gateway to The Thar Desert " is a small town  known for it's ancient temple ruins and exclusive Camel Safari , in

.The ancient town of Thar Desert was a great trading center between 8th to 12th centuries. Today it is desert oasis with 16 Brahamanical and Jain temples, beautifully sculpted and designed, most of which have stood ravages of time.

.
Easily Accessible from Jaisalmer and Khimsar.
Osian(Osiyan)is on the route of Jodhpur-Jaisalmer(Train,Road)via Phalodi. Taking this route via Osian is less traffic and interesting desert countryside to explore. 
the roads are good enough.

A)Sacchiyay Mata Temple- is a popular Hindu Goddess, this is most famous and most visited temple in town, very busy during 'Navratra' a 9days festivity of goddess Durga in month of Sept.
B)Mahaveera Jain Temples inside the city, is also well kept temple complex, very interesting for old stone carvings.
C)rest of temples are just ruines but it reminds the prosperity of this ancient town 1000 years back.
D) there is also a step-well known as Katan Baori , in walking distance est of jain temple; west from car parking.

-This parts(Osian and surrounding)of desert country is less visited and  authentic to experience desert village life,camping and camel Safari in the Thar Desert(Rajasthan).
-Khetasar Village Safari(See weaver, potter etc.)
-Camel Race and Camel Polo at Camel Camp.
